title: Cherokee leader Shoe Boots on children - argument

content.question: Which of the following best summarizes the argument of the source?

choices.label: The author should not be punished for fathering mixed-race children.
The Cherokee Nation must abolish slavery entirely.
The author’s enslaved children should be freed.
Chattel slavery is beneficial to society.

content.answer: The author’s enslaved children should be freed.

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
